;This newspaper, Beijing, October 16th  (Reporter Wang Li) On October 16th, "Xi Jinping Talks" The launch ceremony of the multi-lingual book "One Belt, One Road" was held in Beijing. Five new books in Arabic, Spanish, Portuguese, German and Japanese were officially published and distributed at home and abroad. The launch ceremony was hosted by the State Council Information Office and China International Publishing Group and hosted by Foreign Languages ​​Publishing House. More than 100 envoys, experts and scholars from countries co-building the “Belt and Road” in China, as well as representatives from the translation and publishing industry attended the event.

;

;The guests attending the meeting believed that this year marks the tenth anniversary of the “One Belt, One Road” initiative. Over the past 10 years, under President Xi Jinping’s personal planning, deployment and promotion, and with the joint efforts of all parties, the joint construction of the “Belt and Road” has evolved from a Chinese initiative to international practice, from concept to action, from vision to reality, and from The "general freehand brushwork" of planning and layout was transformed into the precise and delicate "meticulous painting", achieving solid and profound achievements. Over the past 10 years, the joint construction of the "Belt and Road" has opened up new space for world economic growth, made positive contributions to promoting the healthy development of economic globalization and solving global development problems, and has become a popular international public product and international cooperation platform.

;

; "Xi Jinping Talks about "One Belt, One Road"" contains 42 manuscripts written by President Xi Jinping from September 2013 to July 2018 on promoting the joint construction of "One Belt, One Road", and records the "Belt and Road" in detail The process of proposal, enrichment and development of the initiative vividly explains the principles, concepts, rich connotations and target paths of the construction of the "Belt and Road", and helps domestic and foreign readers better understand the significance, ideological origin and practical value of the joint construction of the "Belt and Road" Provides an authoritative reading.

;

;At the launch ceremony, representatives of Chinese and foreign guests jointly unveiled the multilingual version of the book "Xi Jinping Talks about the Belt and Road Initiative". China presented the new book to the foreign guests. The English, French and Russian versions of "Xi Jinping Talks about the Belt and Road Initiative" have been published by Foreign Languages ​​Publishing House.

;Tuesday, October 17, 2023
; ;

;Water transportation is connected with national transportation. It is a history of governance for a huge country and also a history of perseverance in flood control.

;

;Looking back since the 18th National Congress of the Communist Party of China, "water" is one of the themes that General Secretary Xi Jinping has seen the most. When looking at the regional coordinated development strategy, in addition to classifying it from a regional perspective such as the Beijing-Tianjin-Hebei region and the Guangdong-Hong Kong-Macao Greater Bay Area, it is also guided by water systems such as the Yangtze River and the Yellow River.

;

;Why water? Mountains, rivers, forests, fields, lakes, grass and sand, "water is the lifeblood", the foundation of survival and the source of civilization. "The world is full of water, which floats on the sky and carries the earth. It touches everything high and low, and moistens everything."

;

;General Secretary Xi Jinping's visit to Jiangxi this time was mainly to see the development of the Yangtze River Economic Belt and preside over the The fourth symposium on this theme in the past eight years was held. At the meeting, reviewing the development process, the General Secretary said with emotion:

;

;"Since the 18th National Congress of the Communist Party of China, the Party Central Committee has focused on strategic work, that is, the 'big one in the country', and These tasks have a long cycle. On the other hand, we not only focus on strategies, but also implement them, work hard, be consistent, and achieve results over a long period of time. It does not mean that it is over once the planning is completed, nor does it mean that we only shout slogans without taking action. . We all do it piece by piece, with a comprehensive and systematic layout. To do it, we must do it well and complete it." "After the 18th National Congress of the Communist Party of China, we focused on work, and this is the spirit!"

;

;Two words , one is "strategy", and the other is "practice".

;

;Let’s talk about “strategy” first.

;

;That year, General Secretary Xi Jinping went to Dongying, Shandong Province to "see the Yellow River flowing into the sea." Having traveled to the upper, middle and lower reaches of the Yellow River, "I feel at ease."

;

;Those who govern the country well must focus on water management. The allocation of time for various tasks is a window for observing the governance of the country. The underlying logic behind spending a lot of time looking at water is the governing philosophy of "the great nation" where the people's happy life is the basis.

;

;There is strategic thinking in the water.

;

;The most well-known saying is "lucid waters and lush mountains are worth mountains of gold and silver". The "two mountains theory" is now deeply rooted in the hearts of the people, and we no longer "judge heroes based on GDP." From either-or single-choice questions to complementary multiple-choice questions, it contains profound dialectics and is full of strategic foresight.

;

;What the General Secretary said, "There are as many buns as there are soups to soak in" is also a strategy. It is a vivid expression of "water determines the city, water determines the land, water determines the people, and water determines the production". Behind it is the water control idea of ​​"water conservation priority, spatial balance, systematic management, and two hands". Placing water as an important consideration in economic and social development reflects respect for laws and is a symptom of the modernization of governance capabilities.

;

;Grand strategy is bound to be generous. For example, new development concepts, innovation, coordination, green, openness, and sharing are all reflected in water. Speaking only of coordination, at this symposium held in Jiangxi, the General Secretary emphasized “insisting on strengthening regional coordination and integration as the focus.” There will be details at the meeting. The general secretary cordially asked the responsible comrades from 11 provinces and cities how long it took them to get to Nanchang. What used to be a long journey over mountains and rivers now only takes two or three hours. Convenient transportation is the key to coordinated regional development.

;

;Another example is the new development pattern. The blue sea is sailing at Zhoushan Port in Ningbo, Zhejiang, where General Secretary Xi Jinping is brewing a new development pattern of "dual circulation". Taking the domestic circulation as the main body, during a previous inspection in Sichuan, the General Secretary considered that "our main assets are located along the coast" and thought deeply about the concept of "rear area".

;

;Strategy includes tactics. How to fight the battle of flood control?

;

;Look at the map. Water resources are arranged horizontally and vertically. In the east-west direction, following the development strategy of the Yangtze River Economic Belt, General Secretary Xi Jinping proposed the ecological protection and high-quality development strategy of the Yellow River Basin, and the country's "river strategy" was established. The north-south direction includes the Grand Canal, which connects ancient and modern times, and the South-to-North Water Diversion Project, a century-old project.

;

;It is criss-crossed, making thousands of waves, and benefiting all directions. Scattered among them are branch-like rivers and dotted lakes. After the founding of New China, our party led the construction of large-scale water conservancy projects. Since the 18th National Congress of the Communist Party of China, the water resources allocation pattern has achieved overall optimization.

;

;The system concept is a method of governing the country and a major tactic for water control. "Deal with priorities, when to do what, which ones are urgent tasks, and which ones are strategic reserves." The general secretary once warned.

;

;The river and lake chief system is a vivid application of the system concept. Comrade Xi Jinping explored the management and protection of rivers and lakes when working at the local level. Zhejiang has therefore become the birthplace of the river chief system. This idea was further expanded after the 18th National Congress of the Communist Party of China, and mountains, rivers, forests, fields, lakes, grass and sand were integrated into the plan.

;

;Look at the second word, "practice diligently".

;

;General Secretary Xi Jinping feels deeply about this point:

;

;“Like our efforts to achieve clear waters and lush mountains, like our fight against poverty and achieve a moderately prosperous society in all respects, like our joint efforts to build the Belt and Road Initiative ', like our major strategies for regional coordinated development... are all done one thing, one thing at a time, and are done meticulously in accordance with the requirements of the Party Central Committee. Of course, they must also go through repeated feedback, demonstration, and testing. As long as the mainstream is If it’s right, just keep doing it.”

;

;Keep doing it. The difficulty of controlling water is also a microcosm of the difficulty of governing a country. On the riverside, it is not easy to "change customs and relocate" docks, sand plants, and chemical companies. There are "hard bones" everywhere. Without the perseverance of "driving nails", without the spirit of "despite the tens of thousands of people, I will go ahead", without the wisdom of "reaching the broad yet subtle", how could we have today's "river of clear water flowing eastward"?

;

;“The focus cannot be on GDP growth.” “It’s not impossible, but not done.” By governing the country with water management, the reversal of the giant ship channel not only involves changes in development methods, but also affects interests. Breakthrough of barriers and reshaping of development logic.

;

;Only by taking responsibility can we overcome thorns and thorns; only by practicing diligently can we move forward indomitably.

;

;To practice sincerely, the first thing is faith.

;

;In this inspection, General Secretary Xi Jinping recalled that since the 18th National Congress of the Communist Party of China, all localities and departments "first and foremost are unambiguous about the spirit of the Party Central Committee. Deeply understand, unify their understanding, and resolutely implement the instructions of the Party Central Committee." Just implement it."

;

;Comprehensively strengthening party building and strengthening party leadership are unprecedented, and this is the essence of it. The historic achievements and changes that have taken place since the new era have further won the trust of the people.

;

;The "four self-confidences" are also the meaning of the title. The General Secretary once quoted an allusion from "Zhuangzi Qiu Shui" to warn the whole party: "We must not 'learn to walk in Handan and lose our old ways'." The path we are taking is the only correct choice for building a strong country and rejuvenating the nation.

;

;The key to practicing sincerely is to persevere and work hard for a long time.

;

;“A boat sailing against the current”, “A person who travels a hundred miles is half a mile”, “A rolling stone goes up the mountain, and the big stone rolls down if you don’t pay attention”...General Secretary Xi Jinping once used these to describe the hardship and perseverance on the road to national rejuvenation. .

;

;Water control is a long-term task. From the previous diagnosis that "the Yangtze River is sick" to this time, "the current Yangtze River can only be said to be 'recovering from a serious illness'", the general secretary warned, "You can't catch it and relax for a while, and then start thinking wrongly when it gets better.";

;The test of drawing a blueprint to the end is the concept of political performance. As early as when he was working in Zhejiang, Comrade Xi Jinping used the title ""Latent Achievements" and "Manifest Achievements" in "Zhijiang Xinyu" to discuss "the 'manifest achievements' that do not seek quick success and quick benefits, and the creation that benefits future generations." potential'". The "Eight-Eight Strategy" that has been consistent for 20 years has achieved outstanding results. "The success does not have to be mine, the success must be mine" is one of the experiences.

;

;“I believe in action.”

;

;Emphasizing that the spirit of the Red Flag Canal “will never go out of style”, he pointed out during an inspection of the Three Gorges Project that “for the country to be strong and the nation to be rejuvenated, we must rely on us "Forge ahead and strive unremittingly"... There is a national character of hard work and perseverance in the cause of water control.

;

;The pace will not stop. There is always a sense of worry that "you can't worry about it all the time": "The danger of rivers and water sources is a danger to the living environment and the survival of the nation."

;

;Network, mend the network, strengthen the chain, the national water network The construction is accelerating, and the General Secretary is looking to the farther future, seeking sustainable development and rejuvenation: "The construction of the water network will be another century-long picture of the Chinese nation's water control process, and will be recorded in the annals of history. ”

;Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, October 16th  Recently, the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China issued the "National Cadre Education and Training Plan ( 2023-2027)" (hereinafter referred to as the "Plan"), and issued a notice requiring all regions and departments to conscientiously implement it based on actual conditions.

;

;The notice pointed out that the formulation and implementation of the "Plan" is an important arrangement made by the Party Central Committee focusing on the mission and tasks of the Party in the new era and new journey. We must take the in-depth study and implementation of Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era as the main theme and persist in using the party’s innovative theory to condense the heart and soul and strengthen the foundation. We must persist in integrating political training throughout the entire growth cycle of cadres, educate and guide cadres to establish a correct view of power, political performance, and career, and improve cadres’ political judgment, political understanding, and political execution. Focusing on the implementation of the major strategic arrangements made at the 20th National Congress of the Communist Party of China, we should carry out duty performance training at different levels, fields and topics to improve cadres' ability to promote high-quality development, serve the masses, and prevent and resolve risks. It is necessary to build a complete cadre education and training system, give full play to the role of the party school (administrative college) as the main channel for cadre education and training, and continuously optimize education and training methods. We must vigorously promote the Marxist style of study that integrates theory with practice, refrain from formalism, run schools diligently and thriftily, and strive to create a style of learning, simplicity, and clarity.

;

;The notice requires that all regions and departments implement important situations and suggestions in the "Plan" and report to the Party Central Committee in a timely manner.

;

;The full text of the "National Cadre Education and Training Plan (2023-2027)" is as follows.

;

; Cadre education and training is a pilot, basic, and strategic project for building a team of high-quality cadres. It plays an irreplaceable and important role in promoting the great cause of socialism with Chinese characteristics and the new great project of party building. and function. In order to cultivate a team of high-quality cadres who are politically competent, adapt to the requirements of the new era, and have the ability to lead socialist modernization, this plan is formulated based on the actual work of cadre education and training.

;

; ; 1. Overall requirements;

;

;Hold high the great banner of socialism with Chinese characteristics and adhere to the importance of Marxism-Leninism, Mao Zedong Thought, Deng Xiaoping Theory and the "Three Represents" Thought, scientific outlook on development, comprehensively implement Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era, thoroughly implement General Secretary Xi Jinping’s important thoughts on party building, thoroughly implement the spirit of the 20th National Congress of the Party, and conscientiously implement the general requirements and new requirements for party building in the new era. We should deeply understand the decisive significance of the "two establishments" of the party's organizational line of the times, strengthen the "four consciousnesses", strengthen the "four self-confidences", achieve "two safeguards", and thoroughly study and implement Xi Jinping's socialism with Chinese characteristics for a new era. Thoughts are the main thread of the theme, with firming up ideals, beliefs and purposes as the foundation, improving political capabilities as the key, focusing on enhancing the ability to promote Chinese modernization, closely focusing on the party's mission and tasks in the new era and new journey, and continuing to deepen the party's innovative theoretical arming , strengthen political training, strengthen duty performance ability training, deepen the reform and innovation of the cadre education and training system, enhance the contemporary nature, systematicness, pertinence and effectiveness of education and training, educate and train cadres with high quality, and serve the development of the party and the country at a high level , providing ideological and political guarantee and capability support for comprehensively promoting the great rejuvenation of the Chinese nation through Chinese-style modernization.

;

;The main goals of this plan are: to arm the party with innovative theories more systematically and deeply, to achieve remarkable results by using Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era, and to make the majority of cadres more firm in their ideals and beliefs, and more ideological and willful. Unify and act in a more consistent pace, and have more faith and practice in the party's innovative theories to guide practice and promote work more consciously. Political training has become more solid and effective. The party spirit of the majority of cadres has become stronger and their style of work has become stronger. Their political judgment, political understanding, and political execution have been continuously improved. Their awareness of political discipline and political rules has been further enhanced. They have consciously maintained their political stance, political direction, political principles, and On the political path, we maintain a high degree of consistency with the Party Central Committee with Comrade Xi Jinping as the core. Duty performance ability training is more accurate and effective. The majority of cadres have further improved their ability to implement new development concepts, build a new development pattern, and promote high-quality development. Their ability to coordinate development and safety has been continuously improved, and their professional knowledge and comprehensive humanistic qualities have become more complete. The cadre education and training system is more scientific and sound, the training content is more contemporary and systematic, the training methods are more targeted and effective, the training guarantee is more solid and powerful, the training system is more standardized and complete, and the selection and management mechanism is more collaborative and efficient.

;

;;2. Persevere in using Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era to focus the mind and forge the soul;

;

;(1) Focus on gathering strength and achieving long-term success. Improve the long-term mechanism of theoretical education and training for cadres, implement the party’s innovative theoretical learning and education plan, organize and implement the education and training plan for Xi Jinping’s socialist ideology with Chinese characteristics in the new era (see Box 1), systematically plan and make continuous efforts to continuously cast ideas into soul and theory Armed work is intensified. Adhere to the Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era as the primary content of the theoretical study center group of the party committee (party group), make specific arrangements, and carefully organize and implement it; as a required course for the main courses of party schools (administrative colleges), cadre colleges, and socialist colleges at all levels, We should run theoretical training classes and theoretical training classes well; as the core content of cadres' learning, we should study comprehensively and systematically, continue to study in depth, and learn in connection with practice. Focusing on party members and leading cadres at or above the county level, we will carry out concentrated rotational training on Xi Jinping’s Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era and the spirit of the 20th National Congress of the Communist Party of China; carry out in-depth thematic education through special learning, seminars and exchanges, thematic party classes, investigation and research, and constitution establishment Establishing and other forms to promote the Party's innovative theoretical study and education to be in-depth and practical, so that the majority of cadres can more deeply understand the decisive significance of the "two establishments", more consciously strengthen the "four consciousnesses", strengthen the "four self-confidences", Achieve "two maintenances".

;

;(2) Learn deeply and thoroughly, and get it into your mind and heart. Organize theoretical research, strengthen theoretical interpretation, clarify the scientific system and core essence of Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era, clarify the historical logic, theoretical logic, and practical logic of the "two combinations", and clarify the world view and world view of this thought. The methodology and the standpoints, viewpoints and methods that run through it clearly explain the rationale and philosophy of this thought, and educate and guide cadres to correctly understand and grasp the spiritual essence of this thought. Improve theoretical teaching, carry out collective lesson preparation, adhere to the connection between history and reality, international and domestic correlation, theory and practice, promote a teaching method that combines classroom lectures, case analysis, and on-site insights to enhance the appeal and appeal of theoretical education Persuasiveness. The Central Party School (National School of Administration) and China Cadre Colleges in Pudong, Jinggangshan, and Yan'an play a leading role in demonstrating and leading the party, holding seminars on the party's innovative theoretical teaching, and organizing quality course reviews and exchanges. Organize cadres to read the original texts, understand the principles and understand the original meanings, study important works such as "Xi Jinping: The Governance of China", "Selected Readings of Xi Jinping's Works", "Thematic Excerpts of Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era", and follow up on the study of General Secretary Xi Jinping The Secretary’s latest important speeches and important discussions. We will improve the assessment and evaluation mechanism for theoretical study, strengthen narrative evaluation, and make the study and implementation of Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era an important part of assessing the leadership team and measuring the ideological and political quality of leading cadres.

;

;(3) Unite knowledge with action and promote work. Adhere to the unity of learning, thinking and application, and the unity of knowledge, belief and action, and guide cadres to deeply understand the firm ideals and beliefs, sincere feelings for the people, high historical confidence, and fearless spirit of responsibility contained in Xi Jinping’s new era of socialism with Chinese characteristics, so as to build a solid foundation for belief and complement the spiritual foundation. Calm, hold the rudder of thought, and truly be a firm believer and faithful practitioner of Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era. Adhere to the combination of learning and application, and guide teachers to combine practical teaching and cadres to combine practical learning, and closely integrate new problems encountered in practice, deep-seated problems that exist in the stability of reform and development, problems that the people are anxious about, and major issues in the international changes. problems and outstanding issues facing the party's building, we should understand the rules, clarify the direction, learn methods, and increase wisdom from the party's innovative theory, work hard to deepen, internalize, and transform, and constantly improve strategic thinking, historical thinking, dialectical thinking, and systematic thinking. Thinking, innovative thinking, rule of law thinking, and bottom-line thinking capabilities transform Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era into a powerful force for firming ideals, tempering party spirit, guiding practice, and promoting work.

;

;;3. Strengthen political training by deeply understanding the decisive significance of "two establishments" and achieving "two safeguards";

;

; (1) Clarity Key contents of political training. Strengthen the party's theoretical education, take the in-depth study and implementation of Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era as the main theme, organize cadres to in-depth study the party's basic theory, basic line, and basic strategy, and improve their ability to grasp the direction, grasp the general trend, and grasp the overall situation. Insert party spirit education throughout the entire process of education and training, highlight the study and education of the Party Constitution and Party rules and disciplines, strengthen education on political loyalty, strengthen education on political discipline and political rules, strengthen education on democratic centralism and correct views on power, political achievements, and career, and strengthen struggle To develop the spirit and fighting spirit, carry out training on the party's overall leadership, party building and other aspects, improve cadres' ability to distinguish political right from wrong, maintain political determination, control political situations, and prevent political risks; strengthen education on the party's purpose and revolutionary traditions, Carry out study and training on the history of the Party, the history of New China, the history of reform and opening up, the history of socialist development, and the history of the development of the Chinese nation, insist on educating cadres with the spiritual pedigree of the Chinese Communists based on the great spirit of party founding, strengthen education on party style and clean government, and resolutely oppose " "Four Styles" and always maintain the political nature of the Communists; strengthen education on the awareness of the Chinese nation's community and guide cadres to establish a correct outlook on the country, history, nation, culture, and religion; strengthen education on socialist core values ​​and China's excellent traditions Cultural education, traditional virtue education of the Chinese nation, strengthening political and moral education, warning education, and carrying out family tutoring and family tradition education.

;

;(2) Highlight the political training of “key minorities”. We must persist in integrating political training throughout the entire growth cycle of cadres, so that their political literacy and abilities match their leadership responsibilities. Strengthen the political training of "top leaders" and systematically select and transfer leading comrades from localities, departments, and state-owned enterprises and institutions to the Party School (Administrative College) and Cadre Academy to participate in special training. Implement a plan to improve the political capabilities of “top leaders” (see Box 2). Members of the party and government leadership teams of provinces (autonomous regions, municipalities directly under the Central Government), cities (prefectures, prefectures, leagues), and counties (cities, districts, banners) must go to the party school (administrative college) and cadre academy to receive at least one systematic party training every 2 to 3 years. The total number of innovative theoretical education and party spirit education shall be no less than 2 months within 5 years. Focusing on improving political and leadership abilities, we will strengthen training for directors and directors of departments and departments. Attention should be paid to political training for female cadres, cadres from ethnic minorities, and cadres outside the Party. To strengthen political guidance for high-level talents, the Central Organization Department, in conjunction with relevant units, organizes a certain number of talents to carry out national conditions training every year.

;

;(3) Strengthen political training for young cadres. Strengthen the study and education of Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era, highlight the education of political loyalty, ideals and beliefs, and discipline and rules, strengthen the education of fine traditional styles and sense of responsibility and mission, strengthen the awareness of struggle, and comprehensively use theoretical teaching, policy interpretation, case teaching, Carry out systematic training through on-site experience and other methods. The responsible comrades of the party committee (party group) must teach the "first lesson of the class" well. Arrange leading cadres with excellent ideological and political quality, high theoretical level, and rich practical experience to give lectures at the podium. Explore and implement the "political counselor" and "mentor-helping" systems. Through party spirit analysis, practical training, celebrating "political birthdays", and reviewing the oath to join the party, we can temper party spirit and improve political awareness. Implement a plan to strengthen the ideals and beliefs of young cadres (see Box 3).

;

;;4. Strengthen training on duty performance and enhance the ability to promote Chinese-style modernization;

;

; (1) Focus on the "big country". Focusing on the implementation of the major strategic arrangements made by the 20th National Congress of the Communist Party of China, we will carry out the construction of a modern industrial system at different levels, fields and themes, comprehensively promote rural revitalization, improve the quality of urbanization development, promote coordinated regional development, build world-class enterprises, and run well Education that satisfies the people, promotes self-reliance in science and technology, develops people's democracy throughout the process, adheres to the comprehensive rule of law, develops cultural undertakings, builds international communication capabilities, promotes carbon peak and carbon neutrality, implements the overall national security concept, and enhances the ability to maintain national security, Deepen special training on public security governance and social governance, preventing and defusing financial risks, emergency management and emergency response, and enhancing the political and organizational functions of party organizations, so as to improve cadres' ability to promote high-quality development, serve the masses, and prevent and resolve risks. We insist on learning what we do and making up for what we lack, strengthen general education training that matches job responsibilities, focus on the study and training of economics, politics, culture, society, ecological civilization, party building, the constitution, laws and regulations, etc., and carry out military training , national defense, diplomacy, united front, education, science and technology and ethnicity, religion, taxation, finance, statistics, petitions, confidentiality, emergency management, urban construction, public health, public opinion response, grassroots governance, antitrust, intellectual property and physical and mental health, etc. Study and training guide cadres to fill in knowledge gaps, make up for shortcomings in quality, and strengthen weak areas in a timely manner. Strengthen the learning and training of new knowledge and skills such as information technology, artificial intelligence, biotechnology, new energy, and new materials to broaden the horizons of cadres.

;

;(2) Expand training channels. According to the characteristics of different targets such as party and government leading cadres, leaders of state-owned enterprises and institutions, civil servants, young cadres, grassroots cadres, and professional and technical personnel, we integrate high-quality resources and carry out duty performance training through multiple channels and aspects. Give full play to the main role of party schools (administrative schools) and cadre colleges at all levels, and carry out special training around the major decisions and arrangements of the Party Central Committee, major national strategic needs, and the central work of local party committees and governments; give full play to the characteristics and advantages of departmental and industry training institutions, and carry out special policy interpretation, key Task implementation and other special training; give full play to the role of state-owned enterprise training institutions, carry out special training for state-owned enterprise leaders to govern and prosper the enterprise, improve the company's core competitiveness, and strengthen the company's scientific and technological innovation subject status; give full play to the subject and professional advantages of the cadre education and training university base, carry out New knowledge and new skills and other training; give full play to the characteristics and advantages of grassroots cadre education and training institutions to carry out practical training for grassroots cadres; take advantage of the resource advantages of continuing education bases for professional and technical personnel to carry out professional and technical ability improvement training; make use of vocational schools (including technical colleges) to cultivate high-level cadres. The basic role of skilled talents is to carry out technical skills training; take advantage of the wide coverage and convenience of online learning platforms such as the China Cadre Online Academy to do a good job in general training on duty performance; give full play to the collaborative advantages of sending units and receiving units to do a good job in aid dispatch Provide education and training for cadre talents and temporary cadres. Actively create conditions to support on-the-job self-study for cadres. Implement a plan to improve the ability of cadres to perform their duties (see Box 4).

;

;(3) Highlight actual results. Strengthen practice orientation, problem orientation, and effect orientation, accurately identify training needs, strengthen training design, select and match qualified teachers, and comprehensively use a variety of methods to carry out practical training. Adhere to the principle of "talking by doing", focusing on inviting leading cadres, experts and scholars, grassroots cadres, advanced models, etc. to give lectures, so that people who understand policies can talk about policies, people with experience can talk about experiences, and people who know methods can teach methods. Closely follow the actual business operation, increase the proportion of case teaching, and use vivid and vivid cases in practice in education and training in a timely manner; use scenario simulation, desktop deduction, work review and other methods to allow cadres to learn how to deal with problems in simulation situations , resolve conflicts and prevent risks. Strengthen case development and construction of training rooms.

;

;;5. Promote the construction of training resources and consolidate the foundation for training guarantees;

;

; (1) Construction of training institutions. Promote the construction of party schools (administrative colleges) at all levels, focusing on teaching supervision, teacher training, and quality assessment, strengthen the business guidance of higher-level party schools (administrative colleges) to lower-level party schools (administrative colleges), and continuously improve the level of school running. Promote the classified construction of county-level party schools (administrative schools). Strengthen the construction of socialist colleges. Further improve the quality of departmental industry training institutions and state-owned enterprise training institutions. Strengthen school guidance for cadre education and training college bases and grassroots cadre education and training institutions. Carry out quality evaluation of school running at party schools (administrative colleges), provincial (autonomous regions, municipalities directly under the Central Government) party education cadre colleges, and cadre education and training university bases. Strengthen the standardized management of various education and training institutions for party members and cadres, and strictly control the establishment of new training institutions that target party members and cadres. Support local and departmental joint training, encourage cadre education and training institutions to carry out regional collaboration and exchanges, and promote the sharing of high-quality training resources. Implement the quality improvement plan for cadre education and training institutions (see Box 5).

;

;(2) Construction of teaching staff. Increase efforts to cultivate and introduce famous teachers, include cadre education and training teachers into the scope of talent policy support at all levels, and strive to create a group of well-known teachers who are loyal to the Party, proficient in the Party’s innovative theories, have high teaching standards, and are influential in the subject field. Improve the knowledge update and practical training system for full-time teachers, strengthen party spirit education and professional training for teachers, national-level cadre education and training institutions train 2,000 key teachers from local and departmental industry training institutions every year, and provincial party schools (administrative colleges) will be marketed within 5 years , and county-level party school (administrative college) teacher training once. Encourage teachers from national-level cadre education and training institutions and provincial and municipal party schools (administrative colleges) to provide teaching support at grassroots party schools (administrative schools) and provincial (autonomous regions, municipalities) party education cadre colleges. Evaluate and recruit cadres to educate famous teachers, promote methods such as "famous teachers and apprentices", and use platforms such as "famous teacher studios" to strengthen the training of young and middle-aged backbone teachers. Vigorously promote leading cadres to take the podium. Pay attention to the selection and training of teachers among leading cadres, advanced model figures, and outstanding grassroots cadres. Build a teacher pool at different levels. Explore and establish a teaching staff assessment and evaluation system and a professional title review system that are consistent with the characteristics of cadre education and training.

;

;(3) Construction of course materials. Research and formulate a national recommendation index system for good courses and good teaching materials for cadre education and training. Within five years, about 300 good courses and about 50 kinds of good teaching materials will be recommended, of which no less than 1/3 will be case courses and case teaching materials. Vigorously promote the construction of case courses and promptly apply the latest achievements and fresh experiences in work practice into teaching. Various regions and departments develop general teaching materials, professional teaching materials, regional teaching materials and "local teaching materials" based on actual conditions.

;

;(4) Funding guarantee. Governments at all levels must include cadre education and training funds in their annual fiscal budgets to ensure work needs. Funds for the education and training of grassroots cadres should be ensured, and local party committees at all levels can use retained party fees to organize training for grassroots party members and cadres. Local areas with financial difficulties may use their own financial resources and relevant transfer payments from superiors to carry out cadre education and training in accordance with regulations. Pay attention to supporting the construction of county-level party schools (administrative schools). Increase support for the education and training of cadres in old revolutionary base areas, ethnic minority areas, border areas, and key rural revitalization areas. Strengthen the management of cadre education and training funds, ensure that earmarked funds are used exclusively, and improve the efficiency of use.

;

; ; 6. Promote the construction of online training systems and improve the digital level of cadre education and training;

;

; (1) Promote the construction of online training platforms. We will formulate guiding opinions on online training for cadres, implement general standards for online training for cadres, and improve the national standard system for online training for cadres. Build a platform system led by the China Cadre Online Academy, supported by provincial (autonomous regions, municipalities) and departmental industry online training platforms, and supplemented by online training platforms of various units, and gradually form an interconnected, open and shared online training pattern. Promulgate measures for the management of online training hours for cadres, and explore the establishment of a mutual recognition mechanism for learning hours between platforms. Strengthen the assessment of the effectiveness of online learning for cadres and standardize online learning behavior.组织开展平台建设、运行情况评估。严格落实国家信息安全等级保护和数据分类分级保护等制度，按照“谁主管谁负责、谁建设谁负责”的原则，强化网络培训安全保障。

;

;（二）加强网络培训课程建设。鼓励党校（行政学院）、干部学院和部门、企业、高校等组织开发精品网络课程。注重把握网络教学特点和规律，改进授课方式，提高制作水平，丰富呈现形式，提升课程质量。严把网络课程政治关、质量关，规范讲授、制作、审核、发布和更新、退出流程。充分发挥网络培训优势，推动优质资源下基层。用好网络直播培训形式，增强现场体验感。实施干部网络培训提质增效计划（见专栏6）。

;

;（三）加快培训管理数字化。分级建立干部教育培训信息管理系统，完善干部培训档案，实现信息精准记录、标准化管理。加强大数据技术的运用，用好培训记录、培训需求、参训表现等数据，绘制可量化、可评价的干部“学习图谱”。加快干部教育培训机构“智慧校园”、“智慧课堂”建设。

;

; ; 七、深化改革创新，提高干部教育培训质量和活力;

;

;（一）完善制度机制。着力构建科学规范、系统集成、协同高效、执行有力的干部教育培训制度体系，制定加强国有企业领导人员培训工作意见、省（自治区、直辖市）党性教育干部学院高质量发展指导意见等。完善需求调研、计划生成会商机制，统筹干部教育培训与公务员培训、党员教育培训，加强干部教育培训主管部门与行业主管部门、培训机构、干部所在单位沟通协商。完善组织调训机制，严格执行调训审批、报备等规定，完善点名调训和补训制度，实现科学调训、精准调训，定期通报调训情况。完善双重管理干部培训机制。完善东西部协作和定点帮扶、对口支援培训机制。

;

;（二）改进方式方法。鼓励加强干部教育培训方式方法创新。综合运用研讨式、案例式、模拟式、体验式、访谈式等方法，推行结构化研讨、行动学习等研究式学习，探索翻转课堂等方法，开展教学方法运用示范培训。

;

;（三）加强考核评估。创新学员考核评价方式，在中长期班次中推行学员表现全程纪实管理、考核，建立全方位评价体系，探索训后跟踪考核机制。加强对干部教育培训机构、班次、课程的质量评估，坚持定量与定性相结合，进一步完善评估指标体系，评估结果作为干部教育培训机构改进工作、提高办学质量的重要依据，以评促改、以评促建。

;

;（四）严格培训管理。加强培训机构管理，严格落实意识形态工作责任制，落实中央八项规定及其实施细则精神，厉行勤俭节约，弘扬学习之风、朴素之风、清朗之风。加强教师管理，重视师德师风建设，严肃讲坛纪律。加强学员管理，发挥学员党支部和班委会作用，严肃培训期间党内政治生活，严格执行学员管理相关规定。建立学风督查长效机制，发现问题及时整改并按规定严肃追究相关单位和人员责任。

;

;（五）注重理论研究。围绕干部教育培训工作的重大理论和现实问题，深入开展课题研究，举办理论研讨会。中央党校（国家行政学院）办好《干部教育研究》。

;

; ; 八、组织领导;

;

;各级党委（党组）要加强对干部教育培训工作的领导，把干部教育培训工作纳入党的建设整体部署，围绕本规划提出的目标和任务，结合实际制定本地区本部门贯彻落实举措；开展巡视巡察和选人用人专项检查过程中，要注意了解规划实施情况。各级党委（党组）主要负责同志要认真履行职责，及时研究解决干部教育培训工作中的困难和问题。干部教育领导小组或联席会议要完善议事协调机制，发挥协调指导作用。各级组织人事部门要在党委（党组）领导下抓好规划贯彻实施。

;

;中央组织部对规划实施情况进行督促检查，开展中期和5年总结评估工作，并通报有关情况。

;

;中国人民解放军和中国人民武装警察部队的干部教育培训工作，由中央军委根据本规划精神制定实施意见。

;“要把实的要求贯穿主题教育全过程，坚决防止和克服形式主义、官僚主义”，近日在江西考察时，习近平总书记对总结运用第一批主题教育的成功经验、高质量开展第二批主题教育提出明确要求，强调要“实实在在抓好理论学习和调查研究，实实在在检视整改突出问题，实实在在办好惠民利民实事，用实干推动发展、取信于民”。

;

;实践性是马克思主义的显著特征，求真务实是中国共产党人的重要思想和工作方法。新时代以来，我们党之所以能够团结带领亿万人民攻克许多长期没有解决的难题，办成许多事关长远的大事要事，关键就在于以钉钉子精神抓部署、抓落实、抓督查，不获全胜决不收兵。实践充分表明，“实”乃谋事创业之基、做人做事之本；务实功、出实招、求实效，才能推动发展、取信于民。新征程上，广大党员干部要自觉践行习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想，熟练掌握其中蕴含的领导方法、思想方法、工作方法，真抓实干、务求实效，聚焦问题、知难而进，努力创造经得起历史和人民检验的实绩。

;

;理论学习、调查研究是主题教育十分重要的基础环节，又是贯穿主题教育全过程的重点措施。实实在在抓好理论学习和调查研究，就要大力弘扬理论联系实际的马克思主义学风，在推动学习贯彻习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想走深走实上下功夫。要坚持多思多想、学深悟透，全面学习领会这一重要思想的科学体系、核心要义、实践要求，做到学思用贯通、知信行统一，把看家本领、兴党本领、强国本领学到手。要善于运用党的创新理论研究新情况、解决新问题，大兴务实之风，抓好调查研究，在察实情、出实招、求实效上下功夫，真正把情况摸清、把问题找准、把对策提实，真正把调研成果转化为改进工作、推动发展的实际举措。

;

;人民群众看主题教育是否有成效，最直观的感受是看党风方面存在的问题是否得到解决、党员干部作风是否有明显进步。实实在在检视整改突出问题，就要坚持目标导向和问题导向相结合、学查改相贯通，以整改的实际成效取信于民。在浙江考察时，习近平总书记指出：“各级党组织要加强对第二批主题教育的组织领导和工作指导，把握不同层级、不同领域、不同对象的特点，结合实际，分类指导，上下联动抓整改，让群众看到实效。”要坚持边学习、边对照、边检视、边整改，对标党风要求找差距、对表党性要求查根源、对照党纪要求明举措，增强检视整改实效，深刻检视剖析、深挖思想根源、深入整改落实。要把自己摆进去、把职责摆进去、把工作摆进去，抓好突出问题的专项整治，敢于动真碰硬，防止久拖不决、整而不改。

;

;为民造福是中国共产党人最大政绩。实实在在办好惠民利民实事，就要牢固树立以人民为中心的发展思想，以推动高质量发展的新成效检验主题教育成果。要坚持一切为了人民、一切依靠人民，自觉问计于民、问需于民，始终同人民同呼吸、共命运、心连心，通过做大“蛋糕”不断增进民生福祉，着力解决人民群众急难愁盼问题，把惠民生、暖民心、顺民意的工作做到群众心坎上。要树牢造福人民的政绩观，不搞贪大求洋、盲目蛮干、哗众取宠；坚持出实招求实效，不搞华而不实、投机取巧、数据造假；坚持打基础利长远，不搞急功近利、竭泽而渔、劳民伤财。要把为老百姓办了多少好事实事作为检验政绩的重要标准，让中国式现代化建设成果更多更公平地惠及全体人民。

;

;在江西考察时，习近平总书记强调：“用井冈山精神、苏区精神、长征精神砥砺党员、干部，教育引导党员、干部坚定理想信念、牢记初心使命、积极开拓进取、勇于担当作为。”历史川流不息，精神代代相传。当前我国发展进入战略机遇和风险挑战并存、不确定难预料因素增多的时期，必须准备经受风高浪急甚至惊涛骇浪的重大考验。越是任务艰巨、挑战严峻，越要大力弘扬伟大建党精神，赓续红色血脉、传承奋斗精神。要坚持不懈用习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想凝心铸魂，深刻领会这一重要思想关于坚定理想信念、提升思想境界、加强党性锻炼等一系列要求，始终保持共产党人的政治本色，始终保持锐意进取、敢为人先、迎难而上的奋斗姿态，依靠顽强斗争打开事业发展新天地。

;

;大道至简，实干为要。我们靠实干创造了辉煌的过去，还要靠实干开创更加美好的未来。从习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想中汲取奋发进取的智慧和力量，凝聚起求真务实、担当作为、干事创业的强大正能量，我们一定能够胜利推进强国建设、民族复兴的历史伟业，不断创造无愧于党、无愧于人民、无愧于时代的新业绩。

;新华社北京10月16日电  国务院总理李强10月16日上午在人民大会堂同来华出席第三届“一带一路”国际合作高峰论坛并进行正式访问的匈牙利总理欧尔班会谈。

;

;李强表示，近年来，在习近平主席和欧尔班总理战略引领下，中匈互利合作取得丰硕成果，树立了构建新型国际关系的典范。中方愿同匈方一道努力，将两国领导人重要共识不断转化为实际行动，做相互支持的真朋友、发展繁荣的同路人、相知相亲的好伙伴，更好惠及两国人民。

;

;李强指出，中方愿同匈方筑牢政治互信基础，继续坚定支持彼此主权、安全和发展利益。中方愿推动“一带一路”倡议与匈牙利“向东开放”战略更紧密对接，共同努力推动贸易、投资、金融等领域务实合作不断提质升级。抓紧推进匈塞铁路项目，拓展新能源、数字经济、人工智能等领域创新合作，更好助力两国实现各自发展目标。双方要深化教育、旅游、体育等人文交流，夯实两国关系的民意基础。中方愿同匈方加强多边领域沟通协作，维护两国共同利益，推动全球治理朝着更公正合理方向发展。中国的发展对欧洲是机遇不是挑战，是动力不是风险。希望匈方继续为加强中国—中东欧国家合作、推动中欧关系发展发挥积极作用。

;
